Character.name: Elara
Character.backstory: Elara was born into a long line of witches, known for their mastery of elemental magic. After a tragic event that took her family, she vowed to protect the magical realm from dark forces.

Location.name: Whispering Woods
Location.description: A mystical forest filled with ancient trees and magical creatures. The air is thick with enchantment, and whispers of the past can be heard among the leaves.

Artifact.name: Heart of the Forest
Artifact.effects: Grants the bearer the ability to communicate with nature and control plant life.
Artifact.lore: Forged by the first druids, this talisman is said to hold the essence of the forest itself, protecting it from harm.
